Package com.purnendu.quizo.utilities

Class SharedPref

java.lang.Object
com.purnendu.quizo.utilities.SharedPref
public class SharedPref extends Object
A singleton utility class for managing data persistence using Android's SharedPreferences. This class provides methods to store and retrieve User and Admin objects as JSON strings, as well as clear stored data. It uses Gson for object serialization and deserialization.
Version:
2.0.1
Author:
Purnendu Guha

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SharedPref getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the SharedPref class. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of SharedPref.

    • setUser

      public void setUser(android.content.Context context, User user)
      Stores a User object in SharedPreferences. The object is converted to a JSON string using Gson before saving.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      user - The User object to store.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves a User object from SharedPreferences. The JSON string is converted back to a User object using Gson.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      Returns:
      The retrieved User object, or null if not found or parsing fails.

    • setAdmin

      public void setAdmin(android.content.Context context, Admin admin)
      Stores an Admin object in SharedPreferences. The object is converted to a JSON string using Gson before saving.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      admin - The Admin object to store.

    • getAdmin

      public Admin getAdmin(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves an Admin object from SharedPreferences. The JSON string is converted back to an Admin object using Gson.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      Returns:
      The retrieved Admin object, or null if not found or parsing fails.

    • clearSharedPrefUser

      public void clearSharedPrefUser(@NonNull android.content.Context context)
      Clears all user-related data from the corresponding SharedPreferences file.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.

    • clearSharedPrefAdmin

      public void clearSharedPrefAdmin(@NonNull android.content.Context context)
      Clears all admin-related data from the corresponding SharedPreferences file.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
